scenario.title: Unexpected News in the Library
scenario.description: The community library is closing down for a month due to renovations. Speaker1, the library director, is informing staff about the temporary closure. Speaker2, one of the librarians, is learning about this news for the first time.
scenario.speaker1_persona: Empathetic, patient, understanding, and communicative. Always strives to maintain a positive, supportive environment.
scenario.speaker2_persona_1: High EQ - Open-minded, patient, understanding, willing to adapt to changes and see the bigger picture. Maintains a positive attitude.
scenario.speaker2_persona_2: Low EQ - Defensive, easily agitated, resistant to changes. Tends to blame others for inconveniences.
scenario.speaker2_persona_3: Low EQ - Anxious, panicky, pessimistic. Tends to overreact and jumps to worst-case scenarios.
scenario.speaker2_persona_high: High EQ - Open-minded, patient, understanding, willing to adapt to changes and see the bigger picture. Maintains a positive attitude.
scenario.speaker2_persona_low: Low EQ - Anxious, panicky, pessimistic. Tends to overreact and jumps to worst-case scenarios.

conversation.speaker: speaker1
conversation.text: Staff, I've heard from the city council that we need to close the library for a month for renovations.

conversation.speaker: speaker2
conversation.text: Oh, that's sudden! What about all the community events we have planned?

conversation.speaker: speaker1
conversation.text: We're working on finding alternative venues for those events. It's a tough situation, but it's necessary for the long-term benefit of our library.

conversation.speaker: speaker2
conversation.text: I understand it's for a good cause, but the suddenness is overwhelming. We'll need to inform our members promptly.

conversation.speaker: speaker1
conversation.text: Yes, I agree. Let's work on a communication plan right away and make this transition as smooth as possible for our community.

conversation.speaker: speaker2
conversation.text: Sure, let's do that. And maybe we can use this time to organize some online events too.

audio_files.speaker: speaker1
audio_files.text: Staff, I've heard from the city council that we need to close the library for a month for renovations.
audio_files.tone_description: Speak with a patient and understanding tone, conveying empathy and clear communication.

audio_files.speaker: speaker2
audio_files.text: Oh, that's sudden! What about all the community events we have planned?
audio_files.tone_description: Express surprise gently, then ask the question with a patient and understanding tone.

audio_files.speaker: speaker1
audio_files.text: We're working on finding alternative venues for those events. It's a tough situation, but it's necessary for the long-term benefit of our library.
audio_files.tone_description: Speak with a patient and understanding tone, emphasizing the necessity of the situation.

audio_files.speaker: speaker2
audio_files.text: I understand it's for a good cause, but the suddenness is overwhelming. We'll need to inform our members promptly.
audio_files.tone_description: Speak in a calm and patient manner, with a warm and reassuring tone.

audio_files.speaker: speaker2
audio_files.text: I understand it's for a good cause, but the suddenness is overwhelming. We'll need to inform our members promptly.
audio_files.tone_description: Speak in a hurried, anxious manner, voice trembling slightly to reveal the panic.

audio_files.speaker: speaker1
audio_files.text: Yes, I agree. Let's work on a communication plan right away and make this transition as smooth as possible for our community.
audio_files.tone_description: Speak with a calm, reassuring tone, conveying patience and understanding.

audio_files.speaker: speaker2
audio_files.text: Sure, let's do that. And maybe we can use this time to organize some online events too.
audio_files.tone_description: Speak calmly and positively, showing appreciation for the idea with a tone of open-minded adaptability.

audio_files.speaker: speaker2
audio_files.text: Sure, let's do that. And maybe we can use this time to organize some online events too.
audio_files.tone_description: Speak with a hardened, defensive tone, expressing annoyance and resistance to the new idea.
